text: Thomas Patrick Lennon (born August 9, 1970) is an American actor, comedian, screenwriter, producer, director and novelist. He played Lieutenant Jim Dangle on the Comedy Central series Reno 911! and Felix Unger on the CBS series The Odd Couple. He also wrote the screenplay for Night at the Museum, The Pacifier, Balls of Fury, and Baywatch. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American novelists Category:American television producers Category:American television directors Category:Comedians from Illinois Category:Screenwriters from Illinois Category:Actors from Oak Park, Illinois
title: Thomas Lennon
